thread.title: Lisah Strohmaier

author: Lisah Strohmaier
title: Lisah Strohmaier
text:
In my eyes Top Vintage is the best web shop. They are making life for their costumers easy. Shopping on this website is really simple as the give you all the small details that you need to know to find your perfect outfit. All the measurements , material information and so on. They wortship every costumer and are transmitting it. Always there to help. Need the dress for the next day? No problem! Size doesn't fit? No problem! Any questions or needs? No problem.
They are always giving it their best shot, even if that means to make the impossible , possible.
